results.content: He's getting the message across though as a beginner if I didn't have some Development knowledge I would get lost in his fast speech. His dialect is mostly clear and I understand everything he says, the notes though don't carry over very well everything he says. But like I said earlier , he is getting his points across and he is explaining things rather well from my stand point of view. So I think he's earned at least a 4.5 in instruction so far. Let's see if he keeps this score.

results.content: Ive used Bootstrap for years, but have not stopped to try learning it in a class like setting. There are things I know from doing; but I prefer to have a complete understanding. Already learned things I didnt know. Good teaching, presentation. Really well done. Thank you.
